customer_identification.description: Customers identified by URN or ID

loan_account_linking.description: Loans linked via account_number or account_id

branch_hierarchy.description: Branches organized hierarchically with hub relationships

amount_calculations.description: Amounts stored in magnitude fields (often in paisa, divide by 100)

disbursement_tracking.description: Disbursements tracked in loan_od_disbursements and related tables
key_relationships: loan_od_disbursements JOIN account_profiles ON (tenant_code AND account_id)

collection_tracking.description: Collections tracked in loan_repayment_details and loan_od_repayments

customer_loan_relationship.description: Customer to Loan via account_holders (3-table join)
customer_loan_relationship.usage: Critical relationship used in 162 customer reports
